definition: to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: So scepticism about induction is an example of horizontal scepticism.
sentences.chinese: 如此一来，关于归纳法的怀疑论就属于水平怀疑论。

sentences.english: He believed the induction was the magic key which would unlock the secrets of truth.
sentences.chinese: 他相信归纳法是即将打开真理秘密之锁的魔法钥匙。

sentences.english: Induction is a method of common using.
sentences.chinese: 归纳法是常用到的方法。

sentences.english: This paper mainly adopts the induction and Comparative research methods.
sentences.chinese: 本论文主要采取了归纳法和比较法的研究方法。

sentences.english: Bacon's greatest contribution to philosophy was the inductive method.
sentences.chinese: 培根对哲学最伟大的贡献是归纳法。

sentences.english: The claim is that induction is rational by definition.
sentences.chinese: 其论调认为归纳法是理性的定义。

sentences.english: They can continue by transfinite induction.
sentences.chinese: 利用超限归纳法，他们可继续下去。

sentences.english: Sessions were audiotaped, and transcriptions were analyzed using an inductive approach.
sentences.chinese: 会议过程被录音，并使用归纳法分析录音副本。

sentences.english: The analysis is based on the mathematical induction .
sentences.chinese: 我们的分析方式是以数学归纳法为基础。

sentences.english: A definition paper may be either deductive or inductive.
sentences.chinese: 定义说明文可用演绎法或归纳法展开。

sentences.english: And that's the famous Humean scepticism about induction.
sentences.chinese: 这是休谟关于归纳法最为著名的怀疑论基调。

definition: reductio ad absurdum/arguing by contradiction/also called 反證法|反证法
circular argument/logical error consisting of begging the question/Latin: petitio principii

pinyin: wan2 quan2 gui1 na4 tui1 li3
